segments.text: ( A stranger stops to help ) Everything OK ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No ! My tour bus got a speeding ticket not ten minutes ago . Now my engine is on fire !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think that's just steam . Your engine's overheated .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you know a lot about cars ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A little bit . I'll take a look if you want me to .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please . Thank you so much for stopping .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , she's hot . Radiator's leaking . Looks like you were running her pretty hard .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That must have been just before I got the speeding ticket .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you have an accident recently ... Hey , wait a second ! I know this car !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ran into it a couple of weeks ago . What do you know ? Name's Hal .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm Akimbo . Nice to meet you , I guess .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Boy , I'm sure sorry about your car . Hey , Akimbo , I wonder if you'd like to make a deal ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What kind of deal ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'd like to give you cash for the damage to your car .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You don't want your insurance company to pay for it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'd rather not . They'll raise my rates . It'll cost me more in the long run .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you give me cash , do you care if I don't fix the car ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hell , I don't care . Just don'T submit a report to your insurancecompany .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's a deal , Hal . Thanks again for stopping to help . And thanks for smashing my car !
segments.speaker: S2
